content: left between the wrapped stitches ending on a p row k across 10 stitches left unwrapped pick up wrap and k together with stitch w&t p across to first wrapped stitch pick up wrap and p together with stitch w&t k to double wrapped stitch pick up both wraps and knit with stitch w&t p across to double wrapped stitch pick up both wraps and p with stitch w&t continue in this manner until all wraps on knit side are picked up there will be one remaining wrap on the purl side but this will be picked up once work in the round begins again you will now begin to work in the round again in order to help close the little holes that often form at the corners of the heel you can pick up the bar between the instep and heel stitches twist this bar and place on to left hand needle k2tog this should be the twisted bar that you picked up and the first stitch on the instep side then continue to work cable pattern around to last stitch on instep side slip last stitch pick up the bar between instep and heel stitches again twist and place on left needle move slipped stitch back to left needle and k2tog this should be the last stitch on the instep and the twisted bar that you picked up
